### [Title] : Particle Counters

#### Tender Reference Number [numero de référence] : WS3788258425-Doc3815031143
#### Amendment Number [numéro de modification] : 3
#### Publication Date [date de publication] : January 09, 2023
#### Closing Date [date de clôture] : January 25, 2023 14:00 EST (Expired)

### Description

Health Canada seeks to procure three Particle Counters to complement its existing ambient air monitoring program and for use in upcoming air health science research projects. The instruments are required to count particles across a broad size range of at least 10nm to 10μm, and must be able to operate across the entire particle size range.
